Japanese text: こうして、俺の高校生活三年間は幕を閉じた。
English text: Thus, my three years of high school life came to an end.

Japanese text: 思えば、クラブにばかり出ていたような気がするなぁ。
English text: Now that I think about it, I feel like I was mostly participating in clubs.

Japanese text: なにはともあれ、無事卒業できて本当に良かった。
English text: Anyway, I'm really glad that I was able to graduate safely.

Japanese text: とりあえず二流大学に合格もできたし、何も言うことはないな。
English text: For now, I was able to get accepted into a second-rate university, so I have nothing to complain about.

Japanese text: そういえば、彩子は絵を本格的に勉強するため、パリに留学することになった。
English text: By the way, Ayako is going to study art seriously and will be studying abroad in Paris.

English text: By the way, Ayako is going to study art seriously and will be studying abroad in Paris. It's sad not to see her for a while, but it's for her dream, so I can wait forever.

Japanese text: フランス人は魅力的だから少し心配だけど、きっと、大丈夫だ。
English text: French people are charming, so I'm a little worried, but I'm sure it will be okay.
